name: pp_auth_module
description: An example project demonstrating how to port a user authentication module from Node.js to the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) using Azle. Includes code for user registration, login, and session management with enhanced security and decentralization.
author: yasiriqbal776

scripts.build: cd src/frontend && VITE_CANISTER_ORIGIN=http://$(dfx canister id backend).localhost:8000 vite build
